data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wTtuOumz6SUQ7kNvgEEwf0m&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCZ3-E321I-AFHPOK5ha_oeNoagoxXF5WdjLI4wswJ0Cw&oe=6683E2B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cBy2pDa5eWcQ7kNvgHBTpyC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDfYZeJUIj7bU3VDCpjOZspfMvaN98ZASXHJdh-Cx9jWQ&oe=6683F052)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4oWBLs488_gQ7kNvgErah1t&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAGotkg1qyIUIAccEvOaIfuGcwn7xAFcSRKrBgaobTxqA&oe=6683DB89)
